name: Customs Connect Belgium Branch
goal:
Customs Connect is an award winning opportunities and strategy focused Customs and Trade Consultancy that continues to invest heavily in extending our range of value added services, geographical reach and software platforms to support our clients.

Customs Connect Limited (the Customs Connect Group Ltd) was founded in August 2009 by Neil Sheppard to provide high quality Tariff Classification, Duty Suspensions, Planning & Compliance, VAT and Recovery Audit services to industry.

The Customs Connect Group Ltd has established a reputation throughout the UK and beyond.

The wide range of services we offer are designed to maximise our client’s profit.

By combining our expert knowledge with a dynamic approach to assisting our clients, we deliver successful projects on a largely contingent fee basis, during this time we’ve generated many millions in savings for our clients.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Customs Connect provides customs and trade advisory services to the private sector. For our clients we follow policy developments in the areas, a.o., of Customs, Trade, Security and Brexit. Specific policies and/or proposal of interest are, a.o., trade agreements, Customs classification , supply chain security as well as Brexit and customs. In these areas we give feedback on proposals or roadmaps as well suggest legislation changes ( eg. customs classification). We also do represent our clients to the EU institutions in areas which are of interest to them and/or will affect their business. This can be via position papers, specific views or meetings.
